Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.new_content:
# DPO loss implementation (Bradley-Terry model)
    if reference_free:
        reference_chosen_logps = torch.zeros_like(policy_chosen_logps)
        reference_rejected_logps = torch.zeros_like(policy_rejected_logps)

    chosen_rewards = beta * (policy_chosen_logps - reference_chosen_logps)
    rejected_rewards = beta * (policy_rejected_logps - reference_rejected_logps)
    logits = chosen_rewards - rejected_rewards
    losses = -F.logsigmoid(logits)

    return losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards
extras.diff:
--- /workspace/benchmark/datasets/1-DPO/direct-preference-optimization/trainers.py
+++ /workspace/benchmark/datasets/1-DPO/direct-preference-optimization/trainers.py
@@ -71 +71,9 @@
-    ## TODO
+    # DPO loss implementation (Bradley-Terry model)
+    if reference_free:
+        reference_chosen_logps = torch.zeros_like(policy_chosen_logps)
+        reference_rejected_logps = torch.zeros_like(policy_rejected_logps)
+
+    chosen_rewards = beta * (policy_chosen_logps - reference_chosen_logps)
+    rejected_rewards = beta * (policy_rejected_logps - reference_rejected_logps)
+    logits = chosen_rewards - rejected_rewards
+    losses = -F.logsigmoid(logits)
